title: Energy management in commercial buildings
creator_credit: Mark Poole, John Hipwell, Gas and Fuel Corporation of Victoria and Commonwealth Department of Primary Industries and Energy
brief_description: This series of videos was commissioned jointly by the Commonwealth Department of Primary Industries and Energy and the Gas and Fuel Corporation of Victoria. The series is intended for commercial building owners, operators and managers.
